lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: My wife JoAnn and I saw Kiva profiled on Frontline on PBS and we believe it is one of the most powerful ways for folks to help their neighbors abroad.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a library and I help people find information in books and through electronic resources like the Internet and databases.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It has be powerfully encouraging to the borrowers to know someone on the other side of the world wants to bless them.  The word encourage literally means to put the heart in.  I hope that my money helps put the heart in these lives.  I  pray that mercy, peace, love and prosperity will be multiplied in my borrower.   Some people don't think I can change the world.  But I will tell you if the world doesn't change it won't be because I sat at home and did nothing.   I am actually crazy enough to believe I AM changing and taking the world with me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the US government as a consultant. When the Federal Government  need verification of a technical project, I help make sure everything is the way it is suppose to be.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with programmers to modify bank software.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others get ahead, and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is hobbies such as gardening fishing hunting and playing with grandchildren

lenders.name: Mary Ellen
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I offer administrative/secretarial support to executives in the business world.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: to keep them healthy and to help people make their lives better.  I was born in Cambodia, adopted, and now I live in the United States!

lenders.name: Romero
lenders.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.occupation: Vice President for a software company
lenders.loan_because: I know what it means to get a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a software company.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: Using my spare change to make big changes in peoples lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hydrologist at a university in California working to study the effects of global climate change on the water in the Sierra Nevada.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: helping others is a wonderful way to be connected to the world.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I would like to try and help people to fulfill their dreams, and at the same time help improve their lives.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great way to see how we are all so connected.  Way to go... KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: My brother and I oversee the management of the historical buildings that we rehabbed into affordable and market rate housing.

lenders.name: Marty & Barb
lenders.loan_because: As citizens of the world who've been richly blessed, we have a responsibility to help those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: High School Spanish Teacher (Barb), Environmental Scientist & owner of a small business(Marty)that specializes in conducting ecological surveys throughout the eastern U.S.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I believe that KIVA helps make the world a better place, one tiny step at a time.  I hope to see extreme poverty significantly reduced worldwide in my lifetime.  It can happen if enough people take action to make it happen.
lenders.occupational_info: My work has been to teach children to read and write.

lenders.name: Justin,Joy,Gabe,Aidan
lenders.loan_because: It is the very least I can do to help someone else. Wish I could do more!
lenders.occupational_info: My family and I own a small auto recycling yard.

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to live in a country where I'm able to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a cubicle and punch numbers all day. I love it though because my hours of punching are very flexible.

lenders.name: Crews Family
lenders.loan_because: People with access to capital are a key to improving living standards. These funds make it further into the economy than just the people who receive the loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a software company in Hilton Head SC USA.

lenders.name: Clarke
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something with my money that makes some sort of difference - this does that in ways I couldn't imagine. I'm so thankful that I found out about Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach computer animation to college students and am in the process of getting a law degree to make a career change. My goal is to practice in the poverty law area.

lenders.name: Andrei & Carmen
lenders.loan_because: We are immigrants and we started from where most of those requesting loans are now.
lenders.occupational_info: medicine

lenders.name: Hugh, Mary, Bea and Clem
lenders.occupational_info: chef

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone in real need is possibly the best feeling you could ever have. I wish I had more to give.

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.occupational_info: international logistics. import/export consultancy

lenders.name: Will
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a freshman in college studying Arabic and International Politics. In my spare time, I listen to music, hang out with friends, and work for Western Saharan independence.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I want to leave the world a better place than I found it.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage Maintenance, Custodial, Transportation, Food Service and Capital Projects for a School District.

lenders.name: KMS
lenders.loan_because: "Be ashamed to die until you have won some great victory for humanity." -- Horace Mann

lenders.name: Scott&Teri
lenders.loan_because: Giving directly to those it will help and having someone accountable for seeing it used correctly feels more useful than giving to a large faceless organization.
lenders.occupational_info: Scott designs video games for modern video game consoles.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: One way I can help

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because: with these small contributions I can actually make a difference  in someone's life. It is a great feeling to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I calibrate and adjust electronic equipment of all sorts.

lenders.name: Bob & Jane
lenders.loan_because: I want to bring my LORD glory and honor
lenders.occupational_info: Now that we're retired, I really want to focus on helping those in need.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: “Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today.  Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”—Author unknown

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I have been at the same spot in life you are.  Lots of hard work, belief in yourself, and a small break from someone who can help is all you need to succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I help folks determine what their home is worth, most of the time I do this when the home is used as collateral to get a loan.

lenders.name: Mick
lenders.loan_because: I have some. They don't.

lenders.name: Ivan
lenders.loan_because: This is one of the most efficient ways to empower those who would have otherwise never had access to credit.

lenders.name: ed
lenders.loan_because: Squirrels told me to.

lenders.name: Brent & Lydia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info:
Brent: Software support for an  accounting software company. 

Lydia:  High school teacher (teaching humanities and journalism)

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: To change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Boston Police Officer.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I'm happy and I want everyone to be happy too :)

lenders.name: Rubun
lenders.loan_because: It is more blessed to give than to receive.

lenders.name: Irene
lenders.loan_because: when I heard about circumventing traditional, troubled foreign aid I couldn't dismiss the innovative idea!  I challenge anyone who hears about Kiva to not join in and help someone!

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: if not me, who? Change starts with small actions and grows.
lenders.occupational_info: I help student volunteer-driven organizations manage their health insurance plans.

lenders.name: Hilary & Matt
lenders.loan_because: We can and it's a great way to try and make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: TOF
lenders.loan_because: It is much more rewarding than spending the money on wine, women and song, and doesn't result in a headache, rejection or laryngitis.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired mean-spirited Republican, who enjoys joining with others in  bipartisan efforts to improve the everyday lives of industrious entrepreneurs in other countries around the world.

lenders.name: Randall
lenders.loan_because: It's fun.

lenders.name: Srinath
lenders.loan_because: Money should never be a barrier for those who dare to pursue their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for SAP, helping the company build loans management products for banks. I plan to be an entreprenuer in the near future.

lenders.name: Eve Sanz
lenders.loan_because:
Being a small entrepreneur myself, I feel privileged to be able to assist other people who are working hard to get ahead. 

Hopefully the recipients wil be able to pay it forward. I had lots of wonderful people help me to get started.   :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I document the first years in the life of newborn babies and children in the Brandon, Riverview area, in Tampa Bay, FL, creating portraits of them and their families. Our children are the most precious gift on Earth. We owe them a better world.

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because:
we all have a responsibility to help those who need help, in anyway possible. Today's economic problems aren't just for the governments, everyone of us who are priveledged has an obligation to be a catalyst for change. 

I don't want to be a cause, I want to be a solution.
lenders.occupational_info: School.

lenders.name: Harry&Danielle
lenders.loan_because: We want to support this activity.
lenders.occupational_info: Harry was a pilot for United Airlines and flew international routes. Danielle was a school teacher for young children.

lenders.name: Jimbo
lenders.loan_because: The loans are made to instill trust in total strangers.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I think microfinance is a great idea, and a sustainable and efficient way to bring about international development.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a workers' compensation analyst, and develop methods for quality assurance, and other things. I'm a pretty curious fellow, and enjoy learning things, and scheming.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to see good people succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computer systems to help people work more efficiently.

lenders.name: Van
lenders.loan_because: Loans are a commitment which encourages accountability and true growth.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: Why should foreign policy or international aid be the sole arena of governments or large institutions? Who better than the people themselves to foster dignified economic opportunity.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: everyone should.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the building of homes.

lenders.name: Keith & Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to have my students sponsor a loan next school year to teach about economics, geography and culture.

lenders.name: CHAD
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone the same opertunities that I have been given and hope that by loaning them the cash they need they will in turn be able to make a difference in their own life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a robot controler @ Honda my work is very detailed and demanding day to day and I love every challenge that I experience, this type of work also gives me a great ability to give to others in need

lenders.name: Malia
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Coordinate translation projects between businesses and freelance translators.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: To help my fellow brothers and sisters less fortunate than me, may God be their helper.

lenders.name: Michael J
lenders.loan_because: It's a realistic way to help people and I want to help in any way I can. It's a wonderful opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the overseas business for a large Irish brewery in 6 countries in Europe and Middle East

lenders.name: Mark and Dee Dee
lenders.loan_because: Simple way to invest in others outside our borders. We all need a helping hand at times.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Job Corps center teaching high school to young people in training to turn their lives around. My wife works with her sheep and makes rugs out of wool to sell online.

lenders.name: Lisby
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should and I must do to make a better world. I also am excited by the chance to see who I am lending to and to cheer them on from afar.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a magazine writer and editor. I also design and make jewelry.

lenders.name: Fay and Richard
lenders.loan_because: Everyone in the world  should have the opportunity to use their talents to better their lives and the  lives of those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: Fay oil paints and Richard photographs both people and places.  Currently we are working on a project that depicts the Hawaiian islands.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of capitalism and self-reliance to promote prosperity and personal growth.

lenders.name: Matthijs
lenders.loan_because: it's so easy to do and hopefully helps entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: Tenacious people should be fostered.
lenders.occupational_info: I write short stories.

lenders.name: Bobbi
lenders.loan_because: The need is great; we can make a difference.

lenders.name: Leala & Carlos
lenders.loan_because: I believe in investing in the human race.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping other people and businesses grow because someone took the time to see and understand my talents and encourage me with seed money.
lenders.occupational_info: Discover talents with behavioral testing

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Everyone has a story.  I believe we can understand each other better if we know each others stories.  I encourage people to listen to others' stories and how to tell their own.

lenders.name: Michael Smith
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give and I'd rather win or lose money here for a good cause.
lenders.occupational_info: Internet Industry

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that blessings should be shared.

lenders.name: Terry & Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I work with the poverty stricken in South America.  I see and feel the pain and despair.
lenders.occupational_info: We operate two orphanages and are opening a home for pregnant, teenage girls who are homeless in Peru.  Also have a school in Ecuador.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me in the past and this is the best way to repay their kindness and generosity
lenders.occupational_info: CEO of a US company  that provides modeling clay for automotive design studios along with 5 axis milling machines to create the models.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Thank you Kiva for the privledge to give back and help those less fortunate .

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: It's a right way to use money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an adult school teacher. Many of my students are from Mexico and Central America.

lenders.name: Catharine
lenders.loan_because: I have enough and I want to share.  I like the idea of helping people in their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught music (singing and instruments) to school children aged 5 to 12.  Now one of my favourite things is to grow vegetables in my garden.

lenders.name: Trey
lenders.loan_because: Being a business credit analyst for a bank here in Texas I understand the difficulty a small business with limited resources has when trying to obtain a loan. This program allows me to help ease that difficulty and I am happy to be contributor.
lenders.occupational_info: A perform credit analysis on businesses seeking loans from a regional bank in Texas. I am also responsible for training other credit analysts that work for the bank.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: we heard about this on Public Television and felt that this is a good way we can share our blessings with others.

lenders.name: Buz
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with business to determine how to improve operations and profits with better computer systems. If they agree, I work to make it happen.

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see our world become stronger. I believe this can only be done by wiping out poverty across the world, this is a beginning...
lenders.occupational_info: I use my skills and resources to contribute to world issues I feel passionate about.

lenders.name: Lawrence & Susan
lenders.loan_because: We are actively involved in several ministries. When we learned of Kiva it gave us another opportunity to be a blessing to others in response to how others have blessed us. Praise our Lord and Savior!
lenders.occupational_info: Larry is a retired executive who now leads mission trips, volunteers in a faith based afterschool program for under privilaged kids, and leads two ministries at our church where Susan is director of the childrens ministry. She also serves with a local Christian womens organization and is a mentor to other women.

lenders.name: Al Hoefer
lenders.loan_because: I believe in bootstrapping.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Its needed. & I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I make tools that go in all kinds of machines

lenders.name: Dean
lenders.loan_because: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked 24 years on the county airport maintenance crew (driving snowplow, crash,fire&rescue etc.) and went on disability retirement in 2003 with heart failure. I stay busy with volunteer work, fishing, hunting, and laying around reading.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all are citizens together of the world and need to invest in each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I am pastor of an emerging, purpose-driven, evangelical church in Storrs CT.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to help a world that I may never fully experience or understand.
lenders.occupational_info: Miraculous.

lenders.name: Jody & Dean
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great and direct way to help others be self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info:
Jody:  Organizes blood drives to increases blood donations for patients who need it.
Dean:  Educates Doctors about mental health medications

lenders.name: Raj Shahani Memorial
lenders.loan_because: Raj always said that "Each of us can change the world by giving". In his passing, the Shahani family is  continuing to fulfill his vision. To make a loan through Raj's Team Page, go to:  http://www.kiva.org/team/raj_shahani_memorial
lenders.occupational_info: In his 30 short years, Raj’s boundless energy and kindness impacted the lives of many.  As a mentor and inspiration to others, he helped people build their own businesses and better their lives. Raj was an active supporter of Kiva and his hope was that more people would get involved in micro loaning.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: I am a Christian Entrepreneur and love the idea of giving to other businesses and helping them become successful. To show the love of Christ.

lenders.name: Sri & Sudha
lenders.loan_because: We like to help people in need. This is the least we can do.

lenders.name: Brouwer
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is the way of the future and sustainable investments are key to moving society forward.

lenders.name: Steve & Maggie
lenders.loan_because: We have supported small business all our lives, by buying what we need from small business, whenever we can. Now we want to help in another very important way.
lenders.occupational_info: Steve sells used and out-of-print books on the Internet; Maggie is a librarian.

lenders.name: Serge
lenders.loan_because: I can see where all my money is actually going, and the real person who benefits from all this.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work mostly in R&D high technology,
building and testing prototypes of all sorts,
for industrial and consumer goods.
I also teach Taekwondo to children, and adults.

lenders.name: Jon M.
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much but, I still have more than most of these people.  I want them to have a chance at a good start like people in this country.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: The people i can help thru my modest contributions deserve a better life. They ask little, 'some' help.  I have spent time in africa in the bush and know what 'a little help' can mean to them. I must help, it's that simple.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked for thirty years in an ambulance taking care of the sick and injured. I provide medical care and transport to the hospital.

lenders.name: Lorenz
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the effectiveness of micro-loans to help people achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with small and medium-sized businesses, contributing to their success by conducting strategic planning, developing business plans, and doing marketing research.

lenders.name: Malynn and Simba
lenders.loan_because: We both grew up in developing countries and are well aware of the challenges facing those with limited opportunities.

lenders.name: White Family
lenders.loan_because: We love God and we want to share what He's given us with others to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: I love people and help them grow.

lenders.name: Anand
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to any social entrepreneurship initiative; it is empowerment not donation that would make a real difference and I admire Kiva for standing by that. I would increase my contributions regularly and spread the word to my friends.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm with Schlumberger an Oil Field Services company. I travel a lot on work and tourism, hope to see physically some KIVA initiatives. I want to teach english, math and science to kids in the developing world during free time and sabbaticals. My travel plans include countries in Africa and S America. So far I have traveled in over 35 countries all over the world.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with resources and wish to help industrious people to build and grow their businesses
lenders.occupational_info: I assist attorneys with the transfer of electronic information in litigation.

lenders.name: Yul
lenders.loan_because: It feels good and it is the right path

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I wanna help.
lenders.occupational_info: I do many things but my real passion is in  helping people get access to the Internet.

lenders.name: wenford
lenders.occupational_info: hard . but i like it !

lenders.name: Sachin
lenders.loan_because: I have a passion of helping those who are in need.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I loan to others because God has blessed me.  Now I can bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher - junior high, high school and college.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: When I give, I want to know it's really making a difference. Kiva's loans make sure that happens. It feels great knowing that someone will have the opportunity to improve their life, and that I played a small role in that. Now that I've found Kiva, I'm excited to tell all my friends how they can make a difference, too!
lenders.occupational_info:
Business: I help people change habits through hypnosis (e.g., smoking, lose weight, overcome fear).
Personal: I believe if you're fortunate, it's important to share your blessings with others.

lenders.name: Kim & Cyril
lenders.loan_because: I can and should.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I care and I can
lenders.occupational_info: Work gets in the way of life

lenders.name: Brenda and Rick
lenders.loan_because: We want  to help people to have a chance for a better life.

lenders.name: Laura & Tim
lenders.occupational_info: I work on implementing electronic medical records in a doctor's office.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I want to make life easier for other people.  People have taken chances on me at times.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping children.

lenders.name: Chitra & Joaquin
lenders.loan_because: We can and we should.
lenders.occupational_info: Chitra takes care of the kids, and Joaquin tries to be a good student and likes to play video games too.

lenders.name: Natascha
lenders.loan_because: I would like to give back

lenders.name: Joe-Joe
lenders.occupational_info: I am a critical multicultural educator.  My current position is as Assistant Head of School for Diversity and Associate Dean of Faculty for the Ethical Culture Fieldston School, a large independent school in NYC and the Bronx.

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because: Even a bird can make a difference.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a good way to help others. This is important to me.

lenders.name: Mildred
lenders.loan_because: I've needed help and gotten it, and I want to help others, too.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to help the world be a better place by being a better person.

lenders.name: pearse
lenders.occupational_info: Promote renewable energy and energy efficiency in developing countries

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I just simply want to help people.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: People who are willing to try hard should be supported regardless of their economic status.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I feel it's important to give back to communities and to help people realize their dreams

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: It's the very least I can do, any less and I'd consider myself a privileged scumbag.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently completing my MClSc in Speech-Language Pathology. This profession services those with acquired or developmental speech, language, and swallowing disorders.

lenders.name: Benni
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired and working part time in travel seeing the world.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: This is why we are all here on earth ... to help each other.

lenders.name: Lynaya
lenders.loan_because: It's important to the status of all women to be able to sustain their lives and families independently.
lenders.occupational_info: Help women understand and make choices regarding their reproductive health.

lenders.name: Roger, Wan, Mira & Rya
lenders.loan_because: We need to help small business owners to grow.
lenders.occupational_info: Small Business Owner

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the human connections necessary to better our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a fair trade retail business which, among others, ensures artisans across the world receive fair wages, work in safe conditions, and follow environmentally sustainable practices. I also believe strongly in creating human connections between the producers and consumers.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have all that I need.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: To make a positive difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: Web based direct sales

lenders.name: Claire & Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.  There are so many people all over the world doing wonderful things and we love being a part of that.
lenders.occupational_info: Claire is a first grade teacher and Jeremy is an energy engineer working in the sustainable building industry.

lenders.name: Sonya and Ed
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I want to help people in a way that can really work and make a difference because we have been helped by a network of people
lenders.occupational_info: My husband (saxophone)and I (viola)teach a variety of music classes at a college in Massachusetts, USA

lenders.name: psykickgirl
lenders.loan_because: This site is a brilliant idea to let one human being help another and cut out the "middle man".

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: Being so blessed by abundance, how can I ignore the need in our world and not be a complete jerk?  I have everything I need, most of what I want, and all because of a happy accident of fate.  Sharing my good fortune is simply a way to to say thank you to the universe.  I want to help make our world a better place, and Kiva makes that possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse, wife, mother, friend, and devoted Yankees fan.  Grateful, grateful, grateful!!!

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: Just lending a hand...everyone needs help sometime.

lenders.name: Randy and Jamie
lenders.loan_because: We have owned a business ourselves and want to take the opportunity to partner with people who want to start businesses and are motivated to improve themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dentist, but have done a lot of dentistry in foreign countries also.  My wife is a teacher and a business partner with me in the dental field.

lenders.name: linn
lenders.loan_because: I care!

lenders.name: baduncadonk
lenders.loan_because: It's a nice thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Make stuff.

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: It's about time.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to do the best I can for my family, friends and the people I work for.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I have experienced the hospitality and generosity of others during my travels, and a loan to return the same is the smallest of thanks I can provide.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to gain perspective on how they are running their business, suggest ways to improve their products and their relationships with other organizations, and offer suggestions on how to meet their business plans.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to see directly how you can make an impact in the world. I know where my money is going and it is not wasted on administration and salaries like  at some larger charities!

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: the world changes one person at a time.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I like to know that an individual can help another individual almost directly.

lenders.name: B..
lenders.loan_because: This is exactly what the world needs.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.occupational_info: Write programs for computers.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.occupational_info: I sell commercial heating equipment that heats large buildings such as schools, churches and office buildings.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I think great things can happen when people give just a little.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small folk art gallery and a cool funky clothing shop.

lenders.name: Matthew L. Byrne
lenders.loan_because:
Anyone willing to work should be able to improve their living conditions.  I'm well-paid (not by lawyer standards, but what are those, anyway?) and it's time to spread the wealth.  

And it's a loan!  Assuming I get repaid, it's no trouble to me.  And if not, I won't go hungry.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to overturn death sentences on appeal.  There are many problems in cases involving the death sentence -- it seems to bring out the worst in our judicial system.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because:
It works.  It's effective. It's easy.  What's not to like.
How intelligent apply our communication tools to fund humanitarian work. 
A good thing.

lenders.name: Charles & Audrey
lenders.loan_because: Money is a resource that can be shared at no cost to the lender and great benefit to the borrower.

lenders.name: Madison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with their businesses so they can have better lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school student.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I must.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people helping themselves.  This is a wonderful idea, an absolutely brilliant use of this amazing technology we call the internet.  I applaud the people who conceived of and work with Kiva.  Hats off to all the entrepreneurs.  I'll tell all my friends about you.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of people who develop software that is used to collect and diseminate news throughout the world.

lenders.name: Krissy and Steve
lenders.loan_because: This account was started for our wedding.  In place of gifts to us, our family and friends have given loans to others.  We'll maintain the account on Kiva and reinvest loan repayments to other people.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: It is my way of giving something back for all that I have been blessed with.  I am an entrepreneur myself and enjoy the challenge of starting new businesses.  It takes courage, passion and determination. I am excited about this opportunity for me and will share Kiva with my friends
lenders.occupational_info: I love my job as a hairdresser.  I am in business for myself and enjoy creating with styles and colour.  My field is always changing and that keeps me from getting bored.  I am a makeup artist and photo stylist for print/TV Commercials, etc.

lenders.name: Rob Womack
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky to have the opportunity to participate in this project.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people sell large computer systems.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I am Catholic and believe in the parable of the talents (Luke 19:11-26).  If we don't invest what we have in what matters most, people & peace, we will always live in a violent and unjust world.  With this site, even a student living on a tight budget can make a significant difference in the lives of families worldwide- all we need be is courageous and unselfish.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student who is learning to be a scientist.  I work in a lab that is trying to make an AIDS vaccine.

lenders.name: Michael & Carol
lenders.loan_because: It's truly a way of helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Michael maintains weather stations in the remote mashlands of Central Florida by airboat. Carol works in a cardiac unit at the city hospital as a nurse.

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: I HAVE BEEN BLESSED AND THERE IS A WORLD OF NEED.
lenders.occupational_info: I WORK ON AN EMERGENCY AMBULANCE TRANSPORTING SICK AND INJURED PEOPLE TO THE HOSPITAL.

lenders.name: JORDAN and Grandma HOPE
lenders.occupation: Grade School student & An Executive Receptionist

lenders.name: terry
lenders.loan_because: I have had my own business in the past. I know what a little faith and some money can do to help a small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a great group of people who bring performances to school children around the world. (I talk on the phone with schools to schedule performances)

lenders.name: Michael T.
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small businesses are what drives the world's economy, and I want to help other individuals, who, like myself are entrepreneurs and need the financial backing
lenders.occupational_info: I work with small businesses to help them start up, grow, and continue their businesses.  My degress are in Management & entrepreneurship, but my primary job as a consultant is accounting

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone in business in an effective way of improving the family, the community, and the well being of everyone involved. Plus business has to do with hopes and dreams and perseverance and achievement. All things that put a smile on your face.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint the interior and exterior of houses and buildings. I prepare the surfaces and apply beautiful coats of paint. I employ six painters who are all tradesmen in their field.

lenders.name: yang
lenders.loan_because: I come from a very small city in the westen part of china and as you know the average of the families of the westen part are poor.My parents use all of their money to afford my college fees so my family now is drapped into a very poor and bad situation.however,I am a optimistic girl,now I want to do something to change the economic situation for myself and for my family.I want to run a small business like saling colth or some beautiful things for girls.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student now,i will graduate from my university this july. I hope i can begin a new life and change my whole families living quality.I've learned art for about 10 years and I have  very excellent eyes of clothes and beautiful things for girls.I want to open a small shop to sale something special even something I do by my hand.And I reslly need some money to rent a shop and buy some materials.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: this program provides a way to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney by training, but spend time every year in Africa on humanitarian missions.  Currently we are working in Zimbabwe drilling boreholes to provide fresh water to AIDS orphans.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in sharing our prosperity here in North America with others in need.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I'm happy to have to the opportunity -- thank you KIVA and PBS Frontline for inspiring those who can to help out those in need
lenders.occupational_info: I teach history and coach basketball at a public middle school in San Francisco, California

lenders.name: Jere
lenders.loan_because: Country-to-Country lending isn't as effective as it should be and peer-to-peer lending might be part of the answer.  I can help someone make a potentially life-altering leap without leaving my desk.  Wow!
lenders.occupational_info: Like many of Kiva's borrowers, I sell things.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: i can. i have been provided opportunity and I want to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend a lot of time at a computer. when I am not at a computer I like to travel and visit places I have never been to before. I really enjoy photography and practice my photography skills as often as I can.

lenders.name: Gabriel
lenders.loan_because: To do my small part
lenders.occupational_info: Funtastic

lenders.name: Mr. Black
lenders.loan_because: I like business. I like entrepeneurs. I want to help if I can. Help those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a bookstore. I sell books. I hire book and cafe sellers. We sell books, music, movies, and have a cafe. I love books, love to sell them, love to make people happy with good books. I also like business.

lenders.name: Michael and Mila
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a good system to help those who need with out the greed.
lenders.occupational_info:
I program CNC Machines to carve out parts out of solid metal.

My wife works for a law firm doing legal Secretary work.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people and their abilities. There are very few other feelings in the world more fulfilling than the sense of pride and accomplishment. Everyone should have the opportunity to know the feeling!

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I have travelled a lot through Mexico and Central People and seen how many of the people there struggle.  The kindness of the people there has given me many wonderful memories of my trips so I am happy to try to help better the lives of people in these countries and elsewhere.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist clients to lease, buy and sell homes and investment properties in the Greater Miami Area, with a focus on Miami Beach and Downtown Miami.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity of taking their own future into their hands.
lenders.occupational_info:
I see myself as helping individuals become what they are,  remove barriers and develop their potential.  I use coaching techniques, NLP and EFT to this aim.

I am also a facilitator of learning and I specialize in the field of efficiency and performance at the office.  More can be found on the website http://www.performance-partners.eu

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I have the cash, you have the plan; let's put them together and kick poverty's can.
lenders.occupational_info: I do legal paperwork for small New York start-up businesses in order to fund my postgraduate studies. When I have money left over, I like to invest in promising enterprises that help to improve people's standard of living.

lenders.name: Francesco
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microlending

lenders.name: willy ERB
lenders.loan_because: i heard about this site on pbs and i knew if they said it was legit. then i have nothing to worry about.it is such a good way to give 100%of my money to the people who need it the most,for the next year i challenge every american to donate at least $25 a month that is what i promise to do thank you for giving me a route to help people trying to help thereselves
lenders.occupational_info: thank you for giving me the feeling i have in my heart right now!!

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I can and they need
lenders.occupational_info: I design Computer Networks, I am the one who lets the computers talk to each other whereever they are.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: Every business deserves a chance!  This is how I re-invest my income from my depression book (see link below).
lenders.occupational_info: I write books, meet with people who are having health and personal troubles, make films (see www.MeditationMovie.com for my free 9-minute movie "There Is Nothing Wrong With You") and lead gatherings of women.

lenders.name: busstopgirl
lenders.loan_because:
I think it's a good way of being a responsible steward of the money God's entrusted me with - the small (to me) amounts I can afford to loan can make a big difference someone else.

I've chosen creative people to loan to as being creative is my passion, and love that I can support the business of a craftsperson in another part of the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
By day, I work in an office and help a group of journalists publish news stories on a a website about arts and heritage.

By night, I can usually be found watching history programmes on the TV, whilst sewing, knitting or drawing.

lenders.name: The 4 Ds
lenders.loan_because: Our parents make us.  Seriously, though, we like learning about how business works and helping those we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Our Dad makes films about sports.  Mostly American sports but alot of British soccer as well.  Mom's a home maker.  We are are all students.

lenders.name: azmukiff
lenders.loan_because: i am as good as they are without my support group/family/environment that make me today..... I hope i can help make little differences in their life...
lenders.occupational_info: we look for oil, so others to burn....

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info: Law stuff

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I believe that global sustainability is the path to a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with landowners and organizations to help them interact with the natural world around them in a sustainable and respectful way.

lenders.name: Rahul
lenders.occupational_info: I develop solutions to some problems in math, science and engineering using computers.

lenders.name: Melissa and Brian
lenders.loan_because: We want to teach our children that true happiness comes from sharing with others.

lenders.name: Kirk
lenders.loan_because: This is the simplest way which can help people to improve their life. Moreover, I have ability to do it.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: i can, so can you.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: it is the humanist thing to do.

lenders.name: JOHN
lenders.loan_because: As little money as I have, it feels so good to be able to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a machine designer.  I developed machines used in the manufacture of AC electric motor.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: After visiting Africa twice last year, I saw how a small amount of money could make an impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a website that provides tools and information that help musicians and music fans discover and promote music.

lenders.name: Liam
lenders.loan_because: Its a way of helping people who are in difficult circumstances.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed to have been born in a country where opportunities are abundant.  Microcredit allows me to push some opportunities to where they are most needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I monitor the financial performance and decisions of a company that designs semiconductors.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Tove & Steen
lenders.loan_because: Think microloans is a phantastic idea! People help people!
lenders.occupational_info:
Tove is a school teacher.
I am working with computer software for sorting systems in airports, postal hubs etc.

lenders.name: Kathryne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women improve their lives and their children's lives. Not only is this important but I believe it will eventually lead to a more peaceful world for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: fund-raising

lenders.name: Ed & Libby
lenders.loan_because: We have a lot to be grateful for and are thankful that we can help in such a direct way to people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Libby is a marketing professional who helps promote companies, products and services.  Ed specializes in natural landscape services for homeowners.

lenders.name: Sharon and Jim
lenders.loan_because: We can contribute a little with the hope it can help a lot.
lenders.occupational_info: Sharon was a dental hygienist for 30+ years.  She is currently a nurse, self-employed as a private duty nurse.  Jim's health problem terminated his law practice, but he helps in the home and stays physically active.  Our daughter is a Speech Pathologist (Univ. of Wisconsin grad.), employed in Milwaukee Wisconsin; our son graduated from Arizona State in May 2007, received his PhD in Social Psychology from Florida State in June 2013.      Peace.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.occupational_info: I now manage a small family farm after working for over 40 years with a state agency to conserve wildlife resources.

lenders.name: Armistral
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe that we all do better when we all do better.

lenders.name: Mogens
lenders.loan_because: The more I travel, the more I understand we are all the same. Our differences are accidents of birth and culture, not differences of hopes and dreams for ourselves and our families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the food business, and I am a small business operator, just like the people to whom Kiva lends money

lenders.name: ScoinchCorp. Unlimited
lenders.loan_because: What goes around comes around, and I want it to be something good.

lenders.name: Dax & Julie
lenders.occupation: Dax: IT Person / Juile: Homeschooling mom
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a good way to put some money to work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and networking specifically in information security.  Julie educates our children at home and takes care of all the things that are necessary for our home to be a home.

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: God wants me to
lenders.occupational_info: book flights, make travel reservations,

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: it is one small action I can take to make a difference in this world. And, besides it is very rewarding to help someone who is trying to make something of their life.

lenders.name: Deb
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have money to help. It takes money to make money!
lenders.occupational_info: Deb is a software programmer for public health agency.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: This is a fine program to help people who wish to fulfill their work goals.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is with community organizations that improve women's equality and community welfare.

lenders.name: Patch
lenders.loan_because: From time to time I run promotions for downloads of my music, and I use the money to make Kiva loans.
lenders.occupational_info: Musician, Bassist, Guitar Player, Drummer, Singer/Songwriter, Home Recording Enthusiast.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I love to see the entrepreneurial spirit of the recipients.  All they need is a little boost and that is what I hope to do when lending.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to help people empower themselves in a direct, meaingful, immediate way; loaning also connects me to people with whom I'd never otherwise get to interact!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an environmental chemistry consulting firm that helps companies make sure that they are compliant with U.S. Environmental Regulations. I am entering graduate school in Sustainable Community Development this Fall. Also, I work for a local company that cares for pets while their owners are away.

lenders.name: Jacob Thomas
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and HE expects me to be a channel of blessing to others. The Bible says, "He that hath pity upon the poor lendeth unto the LORD".

lenders.name: Janel
lenders.loan_because: i have been fortunate enough to be successful as a woman in a challenging field and would like to help other women to achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: What I do changes from year to year and that is the magic of it.  Some years I am involved in data security, at other times I work on logistics projects.  This year I'm helping implement a tax software solution for international companies.  It's never the same thing two years in a row and that is what makes the job fun.

lenders.name: Norine
lenders.loan_because: I was a single mom with three kids and know how hard it was to support them. I just want to give back and help some one else, especially single mothers.  I also enjoy needlework and doll making and would like to help an artist to pursue their craft.
lenders.occupational_info: I designed hardware for experiments.   My hobbies are needle crafts and cloth dolls.

lenders.name: casey
lenders.loan_because: I have the resources and the strong support of family and friends. I am blessed, and it is my responsibility to spread my good fortune. And it's  super easy, totally painless and incredibly fulfilling.
lenders.occupational_info: As a fine art printmaker, I work as an artist assistant by day, aiding established artists with the technical aspects of printmaking. After hours, I continue to work on and develop my personal art. Every once in a while, i show in local art exhibitions.

lenders.name: Matthew and Julieann
lenders.loan_because: "A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." If we don't make that single step here, others may not be able to go on their journey.

lenders.name: Luiz Guilherme
lenders.loan_because:
To help others help themselves.

Uma mão lava a outra.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people allocate their capital to where it can produce better returns.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. Growing small economies by direct lending to those on the ground works much better than large bunches of foreign aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I do digital retouch on photography to make images look as best as they possibly can.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because:
It's simple, direct and more personal than other approaches and I love learning a little about the recipients, their businesses and their accomplishments. It takes so little to make a difference in their lives. How cool is that!? 

I'm happy to support an organization that ensures that what I contribute actually reaches the intended recipients.

lenders.name: chrys
lenders.loan_because: I can. The gap between the haves and have nots must be addressed.
lenders.occupational_info: I shop, cook, launder, and clean for my family. I drive my daughter to and from school. I volunteer in my daughter's classroom and school library so that my daughter receives the best education possible.  I also work at a medical school  helping student doctors to perfect their bedside manner - their ability to communicate with their patients!

lenders.name: Katarina
lenders.loan_because: I know it doesn't take a lot to make a difference.

lenders.name: Anthony and Katie
lenders.loan_because: Bill Clinton told me to!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a World History Teacher in an all boys Catholic School in California.

lenders.name: Tad
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I paint with watercolors--water, color and paper

lenders.name: Nick Fitzer
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in projects that are self-sustaining.
I love the entrepreneurial spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Zillow.com

lenders.name: Micheala
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse and I care for children with disabilities so their parents can work. I am also a foster parent.

lenders.name: Lara
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing as satisfactory as seeing a person get up and succeed. Well done.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my three children to the best of my ability.  Probably the same as you. With love and reassurance and with the hope of peace and good will to all.

lenders.name: tracy
lenders.occupation: mother & writer & big thinker -at least in my mind
lenders.loan_because: I heard about microloans in 2005 and wanted to do something right away but was unclear how to go about it.  I was thrilled when I found about Kiva this year... I shudder  how I can easily waste $25 and to think it could help a family.  Must not think about it..must tell more friends about KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: I have written for television and produced for television.  My interest now is my son.  My writing is now on the internet.  Which I like much more than silly TV.

lenders.name: Heather & Dominic
lenders.loan_because: Money was raised in an in office bake sale in which all the proceeds were donated to multiple individuals. We are continually involved in the community through charity organizations. Helping our community, whether locally, regionally, or internationally is an integral role in our mission.
lenders.occupational_info: We proudly own a coffee shop and firm influenced by the creative class residents of Fargo/Moorhead, and strive to be an integral part of our community.

lenders.name: Jeannette & Anh
lenders.loan_because: In 1981, I was out of work for 2 weeks. I wanted a small loan to startup a small home business. I couldn't get it.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I'm where I am because others believed in me enough to help when I needed it.  I'm happy that I can give some of that back.

lenders.name: Leon
lenders.loan_because: I can make a real difference that way
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a virology research group. What I really would like to do is spend all my time on the water.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I am incredibly passionate about solving the overwhelming problems of the third world.

lenders.name: Gayle & Jim
lenders.loan_because: We Want To Help People!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Gayle is a Health Care Information Technology Professional and James works in Capital Markets and Insurance Industries

lenders.name: Emre
lenders.loan_because: I genuinely feel inspired and motivated by the entrepreneurial spirit and optimism of these people...

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is much more than a hand out, it helps people to do something for themselves and I believe that's what makes it so successful.  They've combined hard work, capitalism and human kindness.  Not one of these qualities can work well on its own, they need each other and Kiva's accomplished it!
lenders.occupational_info: My husband works very hard so that I can care for our beautiful daughter at home every day!

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people that work hard and just need a little help getting started.  I have traveled to many places and have always wanted to help people in the third world! This is the opportunity I have been hoping to find.
lenders.occupational_info: I arrange loan for residential and commerical real estate.

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.occupational_info: I design and produce educational software for children

lenders.name: David and Leslie
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed with abundance in our lives.  It is our pleasure to help better the lives of others.

lenders.name: Stafford
lenders.loan_because: A good friend had faith in me and loaned me the money to buy a second, bigger truck. I want to pay it forward as well as paying it back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people organize and move their belongings. I especially like helping people who feel they can't throw anything away; I try to help them let go of things that are more trouble than they are worth, and I try to teach people about the false economy of hoarding things that they have to pay storage fees for.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I hope that before I just spend my money on anything I can help smaller farmers increase their productivity and lower food prices, thus helping not only the family I lend to but the poor all around the world during the current food crisis.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am today without the generosity of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with animals and rescue Beagles.

lenders.name: NDSS
lenders.loan_because: it's one of the best ways to aid economic growth in third world countries.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a class of french immersion students in a grade 11 social studies class at Nanaimo District Secondary School. We decided that Kiva was an excellent way to make positive changes in the world and also, to learn about other cultures.  We are working in association with our Teacher (Mr.Boudreau), The French departement, and The Global Action Commitee of NDSS.

lenders.name: Norris
lenders.loan_because: It's better than spending the money on some useless piece of crap.

lenders.name: Martine
lenders.loan_because: I think it is my responsibility to help as many people as I can, as much as I can.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: it helps.

lenders.name: Ali
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: HUSTLER

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with all I need and much that I want.  I also value hard work.  Having visited many countries, I see that great determination is required to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with problems in learning and life.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I am altruistic

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I know that it can really help, and goes straight to the person.  I love that my loan doesn't get caught up in some bureaucracy.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Economics and International Business and hope  to eventually work with developmental economics

lenders.name: Dave and Donna
lenders.loan_because: What we have was a gift to us, and it was meant to be a blessing to others.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I have been extremely fortunate  to have been born in America to loving parents and believe in sharing with those less fortunate.  A small twist of fate and I could be in the shoes of those I lend to.
lenders.occupational_info: Educating those at risk for glaucoma to get an eye exam and developing a network of doctors who will give those eye exams to those who cannot afford them.

lenders.name: Dick & Natalie
lenders.loan_because: To remember the people who helped us when we needed it and to share what they did to others.

lenders.name: Kira
lenders.loan_because: I travelled around the world and saw profound poverty while I was in college.  It deeply impacted me.  We all have intrinsic value, just for being alive.
lenders.occupational_info: listen to doctors' encounters with patients and transcribe the encounter for the patient's medical record.

lenders.name: Elmer
lenders.loan_because: Just like it's been written: "Whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me". (Matthew 25:40)
lenders.occupational_info: My mommy is a nurse and my daddy is a computer/network support tech (Hopefully some day doing something more important which would help people spiritually, not just economically)

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women achieve financial independence

lenders.name: Ken and Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I wish to teach my mancub  to think of others, to help others, and to have a direct effect on someone we have never met.
lenders.occupational_info: I help teach students who have had traumatic lives and work for social justice.

lenders.name: Don and Barb
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this program can help deserving people better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the U.S. Government where I managed computer systems.  I now volunteer my time teaching basic computer skills to low income immigrants to the U.S.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: Work at a nonprofit that focuses on the homeless and those in need.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info:
I go to customer's homes and repair their broken appliances.
I work for a large company and am saving to start my own repair business.

lenders.name: Bambi
lenders.loan_because: I love that changing the world is a revolution of one at a time; each person doing what they can.

lenders.name: sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Showing kindness is great!
lenders.occupational_info: Focused-driven enviroment.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place, one person at a time...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large university and provide administrative support to the professors and students I work with.

lenders.name: P & J
lenders.loan_because: Want to give people a hand up.
lenders.occupational_info: We maintain and repair printers and mail sorters.

lenders.name: Hunter
lenders.loan_because: I understand that it is hard to obtain a loan without collateral but I want to see these entrepreneurs succeed. Loaning is something I can do to help eliminate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying Economics.

lenders.name: Barrett
lenders.loan_because: I just feel this is the best way in which I can help people.

lenders.name: Neville
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Before retirement I worked as a human resource manager for the Government of Canada and travelled extensively throughout all ten provinces and three territories.

lenders.name: WeatherWizard
lenders.loan_because: Hard working, honest, humble people around the world deserve the opportunity to rise above poverty with their ingenuity and entrepreneur spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Environmental management

lenders.name: Bryan
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to follow the Golden Rule.

lenders.name: Smith Family
lenders.loan_because: We are inspired by the difference that healthy and economically empowered women make in their community.  When women are strong the community flourishes.   We are grateful that we can contribute and hope that strengthens our connection to the rest of humanity.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: To give someone a chance to make their own life and transcend the boundaries of our countries to connect in a globally compassionate way with each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I am thankful that I can make a good living as a musician.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I like to believe that someone would offer me a hand up if I needed it.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.occupational_info: Getting an MBA in marketing

lenders.name: Dan and Colleen
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to raise money when you are just getting started and you just need someone to believe in you.
lenders.occupational_info: Dan raises and manages the money for a company which creates computer software for banks.  Colleen is a terrific 13-year-old who likes computers, swimming and helping people.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: The one thing that is almost as rewarding as running your own business is helping someone grow theirs.
lenders.occupational_info: After serving in the Marine Corps I ran a small industrial supply company. The key to our success was treating our customers as business friends and making sure we always did what we promised.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I think it is wonderful that small businesses like mine can directly contribute to helping out small business people in the developing world!
lenders.occupational_info: Graphic and Web designer, who spends a lot of time on Invision Power Board template designs.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the value of responsible capitalism. It is the duty of those who have to help those who have not.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student.

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: People need it,and i have it.GOD BLESS!

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I don't wish to squander my luck, in being born in a wealthy nation, and whatever good I can do, I shall.
lenders.occupational_info: I am primarily a student, however I make a living as a music teacher. I teach private one on one piano, guitar, and music theory lessons. I also teach several classes at the elementary school level.

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.loan_because: We're here to help each other
lenders.occupational_info: I install, maintain, repair and program telephone systems, voicemail systems and networks

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have opportunity.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: This is the most efficient and powerful way to directly invest in individuals and their communities that I have ever seen.  And from a personal perspective I find it very rewarding to be able to connect in such a profound way with someone that needs our help.

lenders.name: Tarang
lenders.loan_because: I have always been rooting for the underdog. Rooting is a fine thing but what better way than giving a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in some amazing Scientific Research and Development labs in U.K and in U.S. More recently switched to working for Internet companies of one sort or another. Today I work as an Agile Coach, guiding teams in Agile practices and most importantly how to collaborate and coordinate with each other while delivering value. I have come to realize that more often then not most work is performed by teams yet most people in Technology have only sharpened one side of the saw - only in technical know how but rarely have played team sports to know how to work as an effective team.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: Kive helps my money do so much good, rather than being put back into the cycle of accumulation. I have enough and it feels great to be able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I design how things will appear - signs, books, monuments and interior environments, anything that conveys a message but also needs to be attractive.

lenders.name: Edwin
lenders.loan_because: It helps us feel that there is strength in the concept that a small act of assistance grows in effect by being multiplied with the lever-arm of effort and desire.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both retired, one from medicine and the other from psychology.

lenders.name: Barb in TX
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes it's easier to help in small increments. Everyone needs a helping hand and no one should feel shame for needing help. That's what makes us human.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers, fixing them and helping others with their computer problems.

lenders.name: Eddie
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help people in some small way. It feels great to know your doing good for others.
lenders.occupational_info: Lighting Director for a Country Star.

lenders.name: Jane and Tony
lenders.loan_because: We want to represent our many generous friends and family who have contributed to Kiva as part of our wedding registry.  We hope to help out other entrepreneurs through these contributions.
lenders.occupational_info: We each work separately as an Architect and an Electrical Engineer and, together, we are starting a design product business.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: i've been given so much, and plenty to spare. i dont see why i shouldnt give of myself for helping the burdens of others

lenders.name: stefano
lenders.loan_because: helping  accomplishes/spreads goodwill

lenders.name: The Loan Rangers
lenders.occupation: A group of Chicagoans trying to spread the wealth.
lenders.loan_because: We're a group of friends from all over the world who all live in Chicago now.  We wanted to give a little back to others in a sustainable, renewable format.

lenders.name: Elise
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the economic benefits of microfinance!

lenders.name: david dyer
lenders.loan_because: As a business owner, I appreciate needs associated with growing a business.

lenders.name: Jonathan and Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: God loves the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: We're students.

lenders.name: ELO
lenders.loan_because:
"The greatest level, is to support a fellow by endowing him with a gift or loan,
or entering into a partnership with him, or finding employment for him, in order to
strengthen his hand until he need no longer be dependent upon others."
 
Maimonides' Eight Levels of Charity

lenders.name: Namith
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great platform to help make a difference in the lives of those who need help !
lenders.occupational_info: Manager - people & business

lenders.name: eric
lenders.loan_because: I hope that this loan can really help people to improve their life.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jerome
lenders.occupation: Meeting Manager in a big international company

lenders.name: Paul H
lenders.loan_because: I am very actively involved in microfinance and know that access to capital for MFIs is one of the biggest challenges.
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting micro-finance in Azerbaijan through USAID funded project.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives. I would rather loan than give handouts so that people will build businesses and lift themselves out of poverty in a sustainable way.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently staying at home with my little children.

lenders.name: Jen Leheny
lenders.loan_because: I think microlending is an amazing and wonderful idea and it gives me a good feeling to help in a small way
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer, web designer, photographer.

lenders.name: Lord Pet
lenders.loan_because: I eat, you eat.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and encourage others to experience the excitement, satisfaction and rewards of being self-employed
lenders.occupational_info: I give advice to clients who want to improve the quality and effectiveness of what their company or organization does

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a tall office building and make sure that the building looks good, is clean, comfortable and secure.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: Money is like manure.  If you stack it up it begins to stink.  Spreading it around makes things grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a laboratory.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.occupational_info: Taking care of 4 very busy kids.

lenders.name: Marcia & Phil
lenders.occupation: Phil is a musician; Marcia has an online bookstore
lenders.loan_because: We are very fortunate to have had the opportunities to live as we would like to live. KIVA is an opportunity for us to share.  Our loans are particularly to women who are the sole support for their families. We loan to any type of business that avoids products that we won't use (namely, animal products or products that may have been tested on animals).
lenders.occupational_info: Phil plays banjo, mandolin, and guitar in several bands -- bluegrass and other roots music.  A former librarian, Marcia now has a bookstore and volunteers at an animal shelter. She also does bookings for Phil's bands. We're both retired from salaried positions.

lenders.name: Kalavida Surf Shop
lenders.loan_because:
We want to make a difference in our world.  We think this is a wonderful way to bring people from all over the world together.  We need to feel more connected to others.  All for One and One for All.
It's a wonderful way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
Kala means to go with the Universal Flow
Vida means life
To combine the two translates to "Hang Loose"
We hope to promote this way of living along with the fun sport of Stand Up Paddleboarding.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I educate children about health in an informal, hands on children's museum.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I have some to share and because I believe that this is the most beautifull and effective way to help people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I build internet pages, married, mother of three boys aged 16, 15 and 14. My first interest: my family and my second is to help people where I can.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's a great thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide legal services to indigent persons infected and affected by the HIV/AIDS epidemic in Brooklyn, NY

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because:
I can.
Entrepreneurs in developing nations
can do SO MUCH with these small loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in Belgium where I am a librarian in the American section of a NATO elementary school.
Je voudrais aprendre Français.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My software helps explore underground for energy and water.

lenders.name: Michael Joy, Esq.
lenders.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference, the scale of that difference is relative to the receiver.
lenders.occupational_info: I design self sustaining systems across many aspect of work and personal life.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people able to take charge of their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Leader of a liberal religious congregation
